commit.message:
CMake: Import installed CMake target for KLU from SuiteSparse (#407)

Newer versions of SuiteSparse install import targets for its libraries.
Use the import target of KLU as installed by SuiteSparse if it is
available and the user didn't set flags to select a different one.

This fixes an issue if the SuiteSparse headers are installed at their
new default location `$prefix/include/suitesparse`.

---------

Signed-off-by: Markus M端tzel <markus.muetzel@gmx.de>
Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

verification.payload:
tree 2f1cdc01dc1bd4677204c954983d5ea2bdf286dd
parent 0f2d49d62be4af9f2770c90ad489dec4c2235202
author Markus M端tzel <markus.muetzel@gmx.de> 1709157680 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1709157680 -0800

CMake: Import installed CMake target for KLU from SuiteSparse (#407)

Newer versions of SuiteSparse install import targets for its libraries.
Use the import target of KLU as installed by SuiteSparse if it is
available and the user didn't set flags to select a different one.

This fixes an issue if the SuiteSparse headers are installed at their
new default location `$prefix/include/suitesparse`.

---------

Signed-off-by: Markus M端tzel <markus.muetzel@gmx.de>
Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

commit.message:
Maintenance: move LAPACK FC macros (#426)

Fortran-C name mangling macros are now only used for LAPACK.
* Rename macros and CMake options from `F77` to `LAPACK`
* Move most name mangling determination logic to LAPACK CMake file
* Move name mangling macros to implementation header

commit.message:
Maintenance: Python3 (#427)

Consistently use Python3, fixes unexpected `make test` failures with dev
tests enabled on systems with `python3` but not `python`.

commit.message:
CMake: Fix CMP0135 warning, remove old CMake workarounds (#424)

* Fix warning from
[CMP0135](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/policy/CMP0135.html)
* Remove `cmake_minimum_required` with CUDA, 3.18 is now the minimum for
all of SUNDIALS
* Remove workarounds for CMake < 3.18

---------

Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

verification.payload:
tree ec1cedb9dc053d61412b435512624467a6f23f07
parent 84747f92e1db712a47192509c7ce6858b2fed591
author David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov> 1708582366 -0800
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1708582366 -0800

CMake: Fix CMP0135 warning, remove old CMake workarounds (#424)

* Fix warning from
[CMP0135](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/policy/CMP0135.html)
* Remove `cmake_minimum_required` with CUDA, 3.18 is now the minimum for
all of SUNDIALS
* Remove workarounds for CMake < 3.18

---------

Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

commit.message:
Bugfix: Clang warnings for strict prototypes (#414)

Newer versions of Clang warn about functions without parameter lists by default. With `-Werror` this can cause some of our CMake compile tests to fail erroneously.

Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

verification.payload:
tree c8e47385642bca03221dbbcdf44f76e9f50aec5a
parent 0bf819622b7a80015c4dbf7a5ffd1933d69a25c6
author David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov> 1707259926 -0800
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1707259926 -0800

Bugfix: Clang warnings for strict prototypes (#414)

Newer versions of Clang warn about functions without parameter lists by default. With `-Werror` this can cause some of our CMake compile tests to fail erroneously.

Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

commit.message:
Combine core SUNDIALS Fortran modules into one module (#403)

Combine all core SUNDIALS (e.g., `fsundials_context_mod`, `fsundials_nvector_mod`, etc.) modules into a single module (`fsundials_core_mod`) for easier usage.

---------

Co-authored-by: David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>

commit.message:
Bugfix: Replace use of FindPythonInterp (#412)

Replace `FindPythonInterp` with `FindPython3`. The former was deprecated
in CMake 3.12 and removed in 3.27,
[CMP0148](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.27/policy/CMP0148.html)

verification.payload:
tree 72b55ab4ccb40fedbc1ec0ceb96152f6c7b7f619
parent e5eec3d1f10733407e95948d95b5075dbe525812
author David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov> 1707166026 -0800
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1707166026 -0800

Bugfix: Replace use of FindPythonInterp (#412)

Replace `FindPythonInterp` with `FindPython3`. The former was deprecated
in CMake 3.12 and removed in 3.27,
[CMP0148](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.27/policy/CMP0148.html)

commit.message:
Maintenance: Add old releases to changelog (#402)

Add releases before 3.0 to top-level change log

---------

Co-authored-by: David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Feature: Add error handling in packages/modules (#398)

Use new error handling layer in packages and modules

---------

Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>

Maintenance: Use SYCL 2020 header (#396)

The SYCL 2020 standard specifies `sycl/sycl.hpp` as the standard header
to include however, implementations may still define the old
`CL/sycl.hpp` header for backwards compatibility. We already require
SYCL 2020 but were still using the old header.

---------

Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Feature/error handling just the core formatted (#379)

Apply clang-format and clang-tidy. There are changes/additions
in the following files:

- .clang-format
- .clang-tidy
- .github/actions/free-space-ubuntu/action.yml
- .github/workflows/build-llvm-container.yml
- .github/workflows/check-clang-format.yml
- cmake/SundialsSetupCompilers.cmake
- scripts/format.sh
- scripts/tidy_and_format.sh

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Feature: Error handling core (#373)

Add core error handling functions and macros

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Feature: Add SUNComm type (#370)

Addresses #275. Requires MPI to be linked to SUNDIALS core if it is enabled thus all-in-one MPI and non-MPI builds are no longer supported. Instead user will have to separately build and install with and without MPI.

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: Steven Roberts <roberts115@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Remove deprecated types (#369)

Remove `realtype`, `booleantype`, and related deprecated macros.

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: Steven Roberts <roberts115@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Remove deprecated code (#360)

Remove deprecated functions

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
